question: Which of the following is true about Nandur Madumeshwar bird sanctuary?
option1: Godavari river flows across the sanctuary
option3: It has been designated under Ramsar list of Wetlands
option4: All of the above are true
answer: All of the above are true
explanation: Nandur Madumeshwar Bird Sanctuary has been designated as wetland of international importance under Ramsar convention. It is located in Maharashtra across Godavari river.
